attributes.action: Rescind the award by the Electoral Commission to Vote Leave.
attributes.background: Vote Leave has held no public meetings, whereas Grassroots Out (GO) has held many huge rallies. GO has many more members than Vote Leave. GO has approached Vote Leave to discuss merging campaigns but has been rebuffed each time.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This was a decision for the Electoral Commission, under the European Referendum Act 2015. The Electoral Commission is independent of both Parliament and Government.
